We serve clients at any given time in more than 120  countries, with offices and operations in 52 countries . The majority of our people are in India, the Philippines and the Philippines . We are a value and solution-led company with approximately 779,000 people as of August 31, 2025, as of  2025 .
 Our strategy is to be the most AI-enabled, client-focused, great place to work for reinventors . We have a culture of shared success, which is defined as success for our clients, our people, our shareholders, our partners and our communities . During fiscal 2025, we invested approximately $1.0 billion in learning and professional development .
 Accenture delivered approximately 47 million training hours, an increase of 9% compared with fiscal 2024 . Accenture’s total rewards consist of cash compensation, equity and a wide range of benefits . For the fourth quarter of fiscal 2025, annualized attrition, excluding involuntary terminations, was 15%, down from 16% in the third quarter . We balance our supply of skills with changes in client demand .
 Accenture has one of the world’s largest networks of centers with deep capabilities that allow us to help our clients create exceptional business value . Our global approach provides scalable innovation; standardized processes, methods and tools; automation and AI; industry expertise and specialized capabilities; cost advantages; foreign language fluency; proximity to clients; and time zone advantages .
 We harness our unique intellectual property to deliver these innovation services . We have a global portfolio of patents and pending patent applications covering various technology areas, including AI, cloud, cybersecurity, automation, analytics and quantum . We believe our combination of people, platforms, assets and capabilities makes Accenture one of the leading strategic innovation partners for our clients .
 Accenture operates in a highly competitive and rapidly changing global marketplace . We believe no other company offers the full range of services at scale that Accenture does . Our clients typically retain us on a non-exclusive basis . We have significantly embedded advanced AI into our proprietary platforms like GenWizard, which enables us to deliver differently for our clients .
 Executive officers as of October 10, 2025 are as follows: Melissa Burgum, 53, became our chief accounting officer in September 2022 . Atsushi Egawa, 60, has served as our co-chief executive officer—Asia Pacific and chief executive officer —Japan in September 2024 . Kate Clifford, 48, has been with Accenture for 27 years . Ms. Clifford was our chief human resources officer—the Americas from September 2024 to September 2025 .
 Kate Hogan, 49, became our chief operating officer in September 2025 . Mauro Macchi, 58, became chief executive officer—EMEA in September 2024 . Angie Park, 53, served as our chief financial officer in December 2024 . Ms. Hogan has been with Accenture for 27 years and served as US West lead from September 2022 to September 2023 .
 Ryoji Sekido has been with Accenture for 33 years . Julie Sweet has served as our chief executive officer—North America since September 2019 . Manish Sharma has been our chief strategy and services officer in September 2025 . Ms. Sweet was a partner for 10 years in the law firm Cravath, Swaine & Moore LLP .
 The Consolidated Financial Statements reflect the ownership interests in Accenture Canada Holdings Inc. held by certain current and former members of Accenture Leadership as noncontrolling interests . John Walsh,  61, became our chief executive officer—the Americas in September 2025 . Joel Unruch,  47, joined Accenture in 2011 as our assistant general counsel and assistant secretary .
 Global management committee (our primary management and leadership team) consists of approximately 55 of our most senior leaders, senior managing directors and managing directors .
